trigger.expression: {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#1,15)}>85 and {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#2,15)}>85 and {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#3,15)}>85 and {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#4,15)}>85
trigger.name: CPU 整体负载大于85% 且持续一分钟

trigger.expression: {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#1,15)}>95 and {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#2,15)}>95 and {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#3,15)}>95 and {Custom monitoring items:cpu_load_status[Usage].last(#4,15)}>95
trigger.name: CPU 整体负载大于95% 且持续一分钟
TCP连接 closewait 数量大于500
TCP连接 timewait 数量大于500
